  • | Info
  • | Error

display_html:

  • message :: Text
  • time :: UTCTime
}

}

}

display_html:
data HydraEvent tx
  • = ClientConnected
  • | ClientDisconnected
  • | Update (AllPossibleAPIMessages tx)
  • | Tick UTCTime
name: HydraEvent ClientDisconnected ClientConnected Update Tick

display_html:
data AllPossibleAPIMessages tx
  • = ApiTimedServerOutput (TimedServerOutput tx)
  • | ApiClientMessage (ClientMessage tx)
  • | ApiGreetings (Greetings tx)
  • | ApiInvalidInput InvalidInput
name: AllPossibleAPIMessages ApiInvalidInput ApiGreetings ApiClientMessage ApiTimedServerOutput

display_html:
data Client tx m = Client {
  • sendInput :: ClientInput tx -> m ()
  • sk :: SigningKey PaymentKey
  • externalCommit :: UTxO -> m ()
  • recoverCommit :: TxId -> m ()
}
name: Client recoverCommit externalCommit sendInput sk Client

display_html: type ClientCallback tx m = HydraEvent tx -> m ()

data OpenScreen
  • = OpenHome
  • | SelectingUTxO {
    • selectingUTxOForm :: UTxORadioFieldForm (HydraEvent Tx) Name
    }

    }
  • | SelectingUTxOToIncrement {

    }

    }
  • | SelectingRecipient {

    }
  • | EnteringRecipientAddress {

    }
  • | ConfirmingClose {

    }
